item.description:
Potluck dinner and game night in Bolton! Come on over after the Worcester VegFest!

Bring that dish you make ~ you know, that one everyone loves ~ and join us for an evening of fun, laughter and great food. Kids are welcome, we’ll have a 12 year old hosting with us.

We’ll supply a main dish, a dessert, and an assortment of board games (yes – including Apples to Apples. and yes – Karim will attempt to influence).

Please post what you’re bringing when you RSVP so we don’t end up with 20 tubs of hummus… not that there’s anything wrong with that… address will be sent to Yes RSVPs.

P.S. There are cats in the house so this is an allergy warning.
item.name: Potluck dinner and game night!
